discussion.p: polymorphic_allocator's member function destroy is exactly equivalent to the default implementation of destroy in allocator_traits ( para 6). It should be struck from polymorphic_allocator as it provides no value.
discussion.note: 28-Nov-2017 Mailing list discussion - set priority to P3
discussion.p: PJ says that Dinkumware is shipping an implementation of polymorphic_allocator with destroy, so removing it would be a breaking change for him.
Status to Open; revisit once P0339 lands. Poll taken was 5-3-2 in favor of removal.
